title: Thought Labeling
summary: Create distance: 'I am having the thought that…'
safety_notes: If thoughts are about self-harm or harm to others, seek immediate help (988 in the U.S.).

offCopy.intro: We'll notice thoughts without becoming them.

steps.label: Label
steps.body: Say: 'I am having the thought that…' then repeat the thought.

steps.label: Observe
steps.body: Notice its pull; breathe lightly and let it float by.

steps.label: Choose
steps.body: What's one small action aligned with your values you can take next?

offCopy.completion: You practiced distance. Thoughts are events, not commands.

verseKJV.text: ...bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ;

light.prompt: Ask God for a sound mind as you act.

verseKJV.text: ...be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind;

disciple.identity: Your mind is being renewed in Christ.

verseKJV.text: ...whatsoever things are true... think on these things.

kingdom.commission: Set your mind to serve in truth and love.
